Wanted to say thank you for the upload. It is brilliant quality and a stunning beginning to a new adventure. 

If I was being nit-picky then its a shame that it's all one file rather than being split in two but that's my personal preference. 

Once again, excellent job and keep it up!

I think the legend of korra will be more than a worthy sequel. 

As for the torrent, the frame rate seems to be a little low, but I dont know if thats my own PC's fault or not. Otherwise, 

A-10 (related note, the soundtrack for this new series is phenomenal)
V-8 (because of low frame rate, otherwise 10 but this is my personal experience)
Content- 11/10
A++, would watch again.
